requirements.summary: Remove the loading spinner and loading screen from App.tsx. Unauthenticated users see LoginScreen immediately; authenticated users go directly to the main layout or ProfileSetupModal without any intermediate loading state.
acceptanceCriteria: On app load, no loading spinner or splash screen is ever displayed.
Unauthenticated users land directly on the LoginScreen with zero delay.
Authenticated users with an existing profile go directly to the main layout without seeing a loading screen.
Authenticated users without a profile go directly to the ProfileSetupModal without seeing a loading screen.
No spinner, skeleton, or loading text is rendered in App.tsx at any point in the auth/profile flow.

file_operations.description: Remove all loading screen UI from App.tsx. Eliminate the loading spinner that appears after authentication while fetching the profile. Render LoginScreen immediately for unauthenticated users. For authenticated users, render the main layout or ProfileSetupModal as soon as the profile state resolves, with no intermediate loading indicator. Ensure the component logic skips any loading screen rendering and transitions directly from authentication check to the appropriate view (LoginScreen, MainLayout, or ProfileSetupModal).
